fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - Your sub-abilities are used at day to make that your night ability for this night only. 1 use per.

fields.name: Sub Abilities:
fields.value:
- Skip the next day and automatically hang a random player that isn't you.
- Deal an Unstoppable Rampage attack and clean the victims.
- Deal a Powerful attack and gain a 1-time use of your target's ability.
- Select a player to deal an Overkill attack to, and a player to deal an Unstoppable attack to.
- Change a player's goal to NK goal. You two can win together.
- Roleblock a player and learn their role, then during the day, downgrade their role, it will be properly downgraded at the beginning of the next night.
- Roleblock a player. For the rest of the game, every action they take will take effect one night late.
